titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt to Louisville & Nashville Railroad Company
CWG13731

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 5

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To Louisville. &. Nashville R R Co Dr.

row.cell: For Transportation as follows viz -- Miles
2 Men 33d Ky Vols. From Louisville To Munsfordville 72.9 @ 2Â¢
Add United States tax on Passenger Transpn
circular Q. M. Genl. dated Novr 14/62 857 c 3 p

body.p: I Certify that the Transportation as above charged was in Bussiness Connected with the recruiting Service -- Under the Orders of the Govenor of the State of Kentucky

John W. Finnell
Adjt. Genl. Ken. Vols.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.
Received at Frankfort Ky, the 18 of April, 1863., of Jno W Finnell Adjt Genl, Quarter-master Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Eight Dollars and seventy six Cents in full of the above account.

NO. 12.
No. 162 Abstract B P Qr. 186
Lou & Nash R R co
Dollars $8. 76/100
Paid April 18th 1863
